#{subDemo.id},

mapper.update:
UPDATE WD_DEMO TD
TESTBOOLEANOBJ = #{testBooleanObj,javaType=java.lang.Boolean},
TESTNULLBOOLEANOBJ = #{testNullBooleanObj,javaType=java.lang.Boolean},
TESTINT = #{testInt,javaType=int},
TESTINTEGEROBJ = #{testIntegerObj,javaType=java.lang.Integer},
TESTBOOLEAN = #{testBoolean,javaType=boolean},
PASSWORD = #{password,javaType=java.lang.String},
LASTUPDATEDATE = #{lastUpdateDate,javaType=java.util.Date},
PARENTID = #{parentId,javaType=java.lang.String},
EMAIL = #{email,javaType=java.lang.String},
DESCRIPTION = #{description,javaType=java.lang.String},
NAME = #{name,javaType=java.lang.String},
SUBDEMOID = #{subDemo.id,javaType=java.lang.String},
SUBDEMOID = #{subDemo,javaType=java.lang.String},
TESTNULLINTEGEROBJ = #{testNullIntegerObj,javaType=java.lang.Integer},
TESTNULLBIGDECIMAL = #{testNullBigDecimal,javaType=com.ibm.icu.math.BigDecimal},
CREATEDATE = #{createDate,javaType=java.util.Date},
TESTBIGDECIMAL = #{testBigDecimal,javaType=com.ibm.icu.math.BigDecimal},
ISVALID = #{isValid,javaType=int},
LOGINNAME = #{loginName,javaType=java.lang.String},
WHERE TD.ID = #{id}
